item.title: Automated Driving
item.description: Here I will write a post about my thesis research. The report can be found here.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Data Scientist 👨‍🔬 based in Helsinki, Finland. Some people call me a designer 🎨, other people call me a nerd 👨‍💻. I do consider myself a little bit both of those, and the truth lies probably somewhere in the middle. I am fascinated by the dynamics in cities and I see it my mission to contribute to liveable cities by understanding the processes within cities through data science methods.
